entry.title: tmux lose colorscheme
entry.content:
alias tmux="TERM=screen-256color-bce tmux"

And set up the default-terminal option in ~/.tmux.conf,

``` set -g default-terminal "screen-256color"

set -g default-terminal "xterm"

```
